comments:
This is using the new 0723 integration build.

I Started up Eclipse under J9, which experienced some failures in the one of the
Team views. This caused it to not load up one of the plugins. Unfortunately,
this prevents me from switching perspectives once the IDE had loaded up. When I
try to switch, nothing happens.

This is the log entry for the NPE that was thrown when attempting to switch
perspectives:

The workspace.xml file

You could reproduce it by trying to start up a current integration build or R2.0
(but not a nightly) with my workspace.

Alright, this _only_ happens in J9. I cannot reproduce under IBM's JRE.
Under IBM's JRE, all I get is this stack trace when attempting to open the view
that triggers the NPE in J9:

Can't reproduce it. Please reopen if you see this problem again.
